rules_text: Exile target land. Demiplanar Collapse deals 3 damage to each creature that has one or more colors matching a type of mana that land could produce.
flavor_text: [i]“I'll burn it all down! The Demiplanes and the Centennial and all the lies they've ever fed us!”[/i]
notes:
